$schema.description: The JSON schema reference for validation.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the resource group where the Azure API Center is located.

serviceName.description: Name of the Azure API Center instance that Dev Proxy should use to check if the APIs used in the app are registered.

subscriptionId.description: ID of the Azure subscription where the Azure API Center instance is located.

workspace.description: Name of the Azure API Center workspace to use. Default is 'default'.

schemeName.description: The name of the security scheme definition. Used to determine minimal permissions required for API calls.
